item.title: Making the R console feel more linux-y
item.description: When I am working in R interactively, through the console, I often find myself trying to run the common linux shell commands: pwd and ls (instead of getwd() and list.files(), respectively). While reading a nice explanation of active binding in R from Colin Fay, I realized that active binding provides a way to bring the pwd and ls commands to the R console: # pwd - print present working directory makeActiveBinding(sym = "pwd", fun = function(value){ getwd() }, env = .
